dublinCore.dc:title: 113 S2883 IS: To require the Comptroller General of the United States to submit to Congress a report on the entrepreneurial impact of technology transfer at the National Laboratories.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Heinrich introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

form.official-title: To require the Comptroller General of the United States to submit to Congress a report on the entrepreneurial impact of technology transfer at the National Laboratories.

section.header: Report on entrepreneurial impact of technology transfer

subsection.text: Not later than 180 days after the date of enactment of this Act, the Comptroller General of the United States shall submit to Congress a report on the entrepreneurial impact of technology transfer at the National Laboratories (as the term is defined in section 2 of the Energy Policy Act of 2005 (42 U.S.C. 15801)).
The report under subsection (a) shall be based on an evaluation of quantitative performance metrics, includingâ€”

paragraph.text: the number of licenses granted to small businesses;
the number of start-up businesses created;
the period of time required for execution of a license; and
